name: Endless Driver Sample Project
description:
It was a few-hour project that I had to do, so I though I would share the source code for people new in game development. It is a relatively clean starting project, you can try experimenting in it. I know that the beginnings in game development are confusing as hell and also really demotivating. I hope this will help people to grasp some basic functionality of the Unity Engine editor.

The WebGL game that runs is preview of the project runtime. I hope it works, WebGL is janky af, might not work for everyone.
